title: Scott Stark as Eclipse Foundation liaison (officer)

content:
[![üó≥Ô∏è Vote progress](https://www.commonhaus.org/votes/commonhaus/foundation/278.svg)](https://github.com/commonhaus/foundation/discussions/278#discussioncomment-14568018 "DC_kwDOKRPTI84A3kpS")

### Proposal

We now have several projects that provide implementations of Jakarta or Microprofile specifications.

I would like to officially nominate Scott Stark ( as the officer in charge of these relationships. I have no great ideas for titles today. Suggestions are welcome.

Notes:
- Naming an officer is a council decision, but input from all is appreciated. 
- Conversation about the whys and hows of TCK certification should remain with #273 

### Voting group

@commonhaus/cf-council

### Consensus mechanism

Please use emoji reactions to indicate your support:
- **üëç (:+1:)** if it looks good to you
- **üëÄ (:eyes:)** if you're "ok" with it (it may not be your favorite)
- **üëé (:-1:)** if you think this needs discussion first

Ask questions or raise concerns in comments.


### Vote counting instructions

Marthas
